StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginTechTree_Name
StringTable.String: APMission2 Drengin Tree

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginImperialismTech_Name
StringTable.String: Imperialism

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginImperialismTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Colonizing new worlds is cheaper than invading them, if not as fun.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginXenoExpoltation_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Exploitation

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginXenoExpoltation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Put all those worthless colonists to work doing something useful.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginIndustrialSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Labor Exploitation

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginIndustrialSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Mental Exploitation

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginIndustrialSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Exploitation

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginIndustrialSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of manufacturing and research centers.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSlaveryTech_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Slavery

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSlaveryTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces the whelps into constructing more advanced facilities.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginConstructionOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Optimized Chain Gangs

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginConstructionOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Slave Longevity

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginConstructionOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Selective Slave Retention

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginMechanizedSlaveryTech_Name
StringTable.String: Mechanized Slavery

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginMechanizedSlaveryTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: With the right tools, our slavelings can build even more.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginManufacturingFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Encourage our slaves to have an interest in guns.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginManufacturingFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Thin out our weakest slaves.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginManufacturingFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Slaves that eat less and last longer

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSlaveMastersTech_Name
StringTable.String: Slave Masters

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSlaveMastersTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Mastery of slave manufacturing techniques.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSlavePits_Name
StringTable.String: Slave Pits

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSlavePits_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes more slaves available.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSlaveMills_Name
StringTable.String: Slave Mills

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSlaveMills_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The only thing better than cheap slaves are really cheap slaves.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginArtificialSlaves_Name
StringTable.String: Artificial Slaves

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginArtificialSlaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Cloning slaves is much faster than waiting for them to grow up.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPersuasiveResearch_Name
StringTable.String: Persuasive Research

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPersuasiveResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force our smartest slaves to be smarter.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginResearchOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Creative Motivation

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginResearchOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves research with the use of creative motivation techniques.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginResearchOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Creative Living

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginResearchOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Pack more research slaves into the same amount of space.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginResearchOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Creative Resources

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginResearchOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Who needs test subjects when you have researchers.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginResearchExtraction_Name
StringTable.String: Research Extraction

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginResearchExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Extract ideas from their smart little brains.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginIntelligenceAmplification_Name
StringTable.String: Intelligence Amplification

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginIntelligenceAmplification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boosts the intelligence of slaves.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginDeeperKnowledge_Name
StringTable.String: Mysterious Knowledge

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginDeeperKnowledge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of reduced torture research facilities.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginQuantumUnderstanding_Name
StringTable.String: Pain-Free Understanding

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginQuantumUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of torture-free research facilities.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginBeyondMortality_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of ultra-torture research facilities. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginResearchCoordination_Name
StringTable.String: Slave Coordination

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginResearchCoordination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Letting the slaves talk is dangerous but necessary.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginNeroLinking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Link slave brains together.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPlanetaryImprovement_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Exploitation

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPlanetaryImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: We must whip these new planets into shape.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPlanetarySpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force planets to make more food.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPlanetarySpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force planets to make more slavelings.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPlanetarySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force planets to be more productive.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adapt our livestock to alien environments.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginAgriculturalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Make our meat crops meatier.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginAgriculturalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Make our meat farms more efficient.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginAgriculturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance cost of meat farms.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginIntensiveFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of high density meat farms.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginFarmingFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Make our meat crops even meatier.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginFarmingFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Make meat farms even more efficient.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginFarmingFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance cost of meat farms even more.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLosslessFarming_Name
StringTable.String: Meat Trees

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLosslessFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic meat farms.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginAgriculturalMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Maximizes meat crop yield

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginAgriculturalMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Arousing Farming

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginAgriculturalMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Meat farms increase population growth

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSlaveringRecycling_Name
StringTable.String: Slaveling Recycling

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSlaveringRecycling_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Recycled Slaves

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginProteinResequencing_Name
StringTable.String: Protein Resequencing

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginProteinResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Protein sequencing farms.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPopulationEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Bio Enhancement

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPopulationEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces the population to be stronger and live longer.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginBioReplication_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin cloning useful slavelings.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginEnvironmentalEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Beat the planet into submission.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginExtremeWorldColonization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force the slavelings to settle on extreme worlds.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginAtmosphericCleansing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force the slavelings to live and die on radioactive and toxic worlds. Mostly die.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginTerraformingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Make awful planets less awful.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHabitatImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Batter even the unruliest land into shape.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSoilReclamation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Create useful soil from almost nothing.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginEnvironmentalResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Let's use continents that don't even exist yet.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginEngineeringTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: We can now make hyperdrives and tiny hulls.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginInterstellarTravel_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Gives weaklings more air, as well as better sensors and hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginInterstellarSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be faster.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginInterstellarSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to travel further.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginIonDriveTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Now we can make hyperdrives that eat more.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginIonOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be faster.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginIonOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginIonOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginWarpFieldTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Now we can stack hyperfields on top of each other.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginWarpFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to go faster.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginWarpFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginWarpFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHyperwarpWaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Now we can make hyperdrives more hyper.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHyperwarpMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHyperwarpMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginStellarFoldingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the ultimate hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHyperfieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces friendly ships to be faster.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginGravityFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be more maneuverable.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHyperfieldDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces enemy ships to be slower.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginStellarFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces friendly ships to be even more faster.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginInterstellarSurvey_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Now we can make better tools for looking at planets.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSensorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to see further.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSensorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSensorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginEnergyFieldSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our looking tools have gotten more advanced again!

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginEnergyFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to see further.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginEnergyFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginEnergyFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSubspaceSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our looking tools are now very good looking.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSensorMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSensorMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginTargetingAssistTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build targeting and stealth modules.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginTargetingSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build fleet-wide targeting and jamming modules.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginXenoArcheology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPrecursorStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPrecursorRelicFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor relic research to be better.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPrecursorRelicFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor relic cultural benefits to be better.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPrecursorRelicFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor relic economic benefits to be better.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPrecursorExploitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPrecursorEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPrecursorUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLifeSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Better life support systems makes our ships go further.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLifeSupportOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to travel further.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLifeSupportOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLifeSupportOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSupportFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advanced life support forces our crew to do more with less.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSupportFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to travel further.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSupportFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSupportFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginPromethionSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Exotic life support systems feed our crews less than ever.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLifeSupportMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLifeSupportMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLosslessSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lossless life support systems humiliate our crews more than ever.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSupportFieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Support fields extend the range of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginExplorationExtention_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advanced support fields extend a fleet's range even more.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginOrbitalManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: In orbit we can make bigger, meaner ships.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginOrbitalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force our Starports to work better.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginOrbitalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force our infrastructure to be more efficient.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginOrbitalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be packed tighter.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginZeroGravityConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build medium hulls.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginZeroGravityOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be tougher.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginZeroGravityOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginZeroGravityOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be packed tighter.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLargeScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build large hulls.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginOrbitalConstructionFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be tougher.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginOrbitalConstructionFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginOrbitalConstructionFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be packed tighter.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginMassiveScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build huge hulls.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHullMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHullMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be packed tighter.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHullStrengthening_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our hulls to be tougher.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build hull support and repair modules.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginSelfHealingHulls_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build tactical repair modules.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginCarrierTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHighCapacityCarriers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build high capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginInterstellarLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Logistics to be better. Lets us build mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLogisticalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Logistics to be better.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLogisticalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces mines to be more productive.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLogisticalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Starports

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLogisticalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces starports to decay less.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginFleetLogisticsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Logistics to be way better.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginDeepSpaceLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Logistics to be better still.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginGalacticLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Logistics to be the best.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginInterstellarMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHighEfficiencyMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our mining facilities to be better.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginResourceExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build highly efficient extractors.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginLosslessMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build targeted resource extractors.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginWarfareTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: War isn't the only thing we're good at. But we are really good at it.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginWeaponsSystemsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build basic guns.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginBeamWeapons_ShortDec

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginBeamWeaponOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be cheaper.

StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to do more damage.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHighEnergyFocus2_ShortDec

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's beam weapons to be extra better.

StringTable.Label: APMission2_DrenginHighEnergyMagnification_ShortDec

StringTable.String: Lets us build better missiles.

StringTable.String: Forces missile launchers to shoot faster.
